faqs.question: What is the typical turnaround time for a background check?
faqs.answer: Turnaround times vary by search type; most complete in 24–72 hours. Some county or international checks may take longer.

faqs.question: Is ChexPro FCRA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes. We adhere to the FCRA and all applicable laws, prioritizing data privacy and accuracy.

faqs.question: What information is needed to run a background check?
faqs.answer: Typically, the applicant's full name, date of birth, SSN (for US checks), and current address. Consent is always required.

faqs.question: How do I dispute information on my report?
faqs.answer: Contact our support team or follow the instructions included with your report to initiate a dispute. We investigate promptly.

faqs.question: What payment types do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept major credit cards and ACH for business accounts. Contact sales for billing options.

servicesPage.metaDescription: Explore ChexPro's full suite of background screening services. From criminal record checks to international screening, we provide tailored solutions for every need.
servicesPage.heading: Our Comprehensive Screening Services
servicesPage.intro: ChexPro provides a full suite of reliable and compliant background check services tailored to your specific needs.

criminal.title: Comprehensive Criminal Record Checks
criminal.shortDesc: In-depth search of local, county, state, and federal criminal records to ensure a safe and secure workplace.
criminal.details: Our extensive criminal record checks provide critical information to help you assess risk and maintain a secure environment. We access a vast network of databases, including national criminal records, sex offender registries, county and statewide repositories, and federal court records. This service is essential for any role, especially those requiring a high degree of trust and security.

employment.title: Thorough Employment Verification
employment.shortDesc: Confirm past employment history, including dates, positions, and reasons for leaving.
employment.details: Verify the accuracy and integrity of an applicant's claimed work experience. Our dedicated team contacts previous employers to confirm job titles, dates of employment, job duties, and reasons for leaving (where permissible by law). This ensures you hire candidates with a proven and honest track record.

education.title: Reliable Education Verification
education.shortDesc: Verify academic qualifications, degrees, certifications, and attendance from any institution worldwide.
education.details: Confirm educational credentials directly from the source. We verify degrees, diplomas, certificates, attendance dates, and honors from high schools, colleges, universities, and vocational schools across the globe. This is essential for roles where specific educational qualifications are a mandatory requirement.

credit.title: FCRA-Compliant Credit Checks
credit.shortDesc: Assess financial responsibility and trustworthiness for relevant positions with full legal compliance.
credit.details: Provided in strict compliance with the FCRA, our employment credit reports offer valuable insights into an applicant's financial history and sense of responsibility. This is particularly relevant for positions involving financial management, access to cash, or fiduciary duties. This check always requires explicit applicant consent.

reference.title: In-Depth Reference Checks
reference.shortDesc: Gain qualitative insights through professional and personal reference interviews.
reference.details: Go beyond the resume and gain deeper insights into an applicant's skills, work ethic, reliability, and character. Our team conducts structured, professional interviews with their provided references to gather the qualitative data you need to support your hiring decision.

drug.title: Streamlined Drug Screening Coordination
drug.shortDesc: Effortless coordination of pre-employment and ongoing drug testing with a nationwide network of labs.
drug.details: We partner with certified labs across the country to offer a comprehensive range of drug testing panels (e.g., 5-panel, 10-panel, custom panels). Our streamlined coordination service simplifies scheduling, sample collection, and results management, helping you maintain a safe and drug-free workplace.

health.title: Comprehensive Health & Medical Screening
health.shortDesc: Facilitate job-specific health and medical assessments to ensure candidate fitness and safety.
health.details: We coordinate a variety of health screenings, including physical exams, DOT physicals, and other occupational health assessments required for specific roles. We work with a network of healthcare providers to ensure compliance with job-related health and safety standards.

international.title: Global International Screening
international.shortDesc: Comprehensive global checks for candidates with international work or education backgrounds.
international.details: For candidates who have lived, worked, or studied abroad, we offer international criminal record checks, employment verifications, and education verifications. Our global network allows us to provide comprehensive screening, with coverage and availability varying by country.

tenant.title: Reliable Tenant Screening
tenant.shortDesc: Comprehensive screening for landlords and property managers to protect your investment.
tenant.details: Make informed rental decisions and mitigate risks. Our tenant screening package includes credit reports, eviction history, criminal background checks, and income verification to help you select reliable and responsible tenants for your properties.

fcra.title: FCRA Compliance
fcra.summary: ChexPro is fully committed to complying with the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA).
details: The FCRA is a federal law that regulates how consumer reporting agencies (CRAs) collect, use, and share consumer information.

We ensure that all our background screening processes adhere to FCRA requirements, including obtaining proper consent, providing consumers with copies of their reports, and following dispute resolution procedures.
Our platform is designed to help employers and other users meet their FCRA obligations, such as providing pre-adverse and adverse action notices.
We provide resources and training to our clients to help them understand their responsibilities under the FCRA.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security & Privacy
dataSecurity.summary: Protecting sensitive information is paramount at ChexPro.
details: We employ robust security measures, including data encryption in transit and at rest, to safeguard personal information.
Our systems utilize multi-factor authentication, access controls, and regular security audits to prevent unauthorized access.
We adhere to industry best practices for data privacy and have implemented policies and procedures to manage data handling and retention responsibly.
Our infrastructure is designed for high availability and disaster recovery to ensure continuous service and data integrity.

disclaimers.title: Important Disclaimers
disclaimers.summary: Key information regarding the use of our services and reports.
details: Background check reports provided by ChexPro are for permissible purposes only as defined by the FCRA and other applicable laws.
Clients are responsible for using the information obtained from background checks in a manner consistent with all legal requirements, including anti-discrimination laws.

While ChexPro strives for maximum accuracy, information is sourced from various public and private databases, and occasional inaccuracies or outdated information may occur. We have processes for disputing and correcting information.
ChexPro does not provide legal advice. Clients should consult with their legal counsel regarding their specific compliance obligations.

clientResponsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
clientResponsibilities.summary: Understanding your obligations when using ChexPro services.
details: Obtain proper authorization and consent from individuals before requesting a background check.
Use background check information only for the permissible purpose stated at the time of request.
Comply with all FCRA requirements, including pre-adverse and adverse action notification processes if making an adverse decision based in whole or in part on a consumer report.
Securely handle and dispose of consumer reports and sensitive information.
Notify ChexPro of any disputes or inaccuracies found in reports.
